title: Ranked AFK
body: Lately i have reached silver five and have been on a rampaging hot streak towards silver four. The first game when i hit s4 promos everything is fine our ezreal gets a double and the kill score is 7 to 2 with our lead. About a minute later, the ezreal goes afk and stays that way the rest of the game except for a minute when he came back and ran down mid. I would like this kinda crap to be noticed and the player to be reported, or for that to not count as an official loss in promotional series.

replies.body: Man, that really sucks that it happened in a Ranked Match =\ . I hope you made sure to report him in the post-game lobby, as that's your best way to get our attention for those things.
Thanks I did. Luckily i won the next two promo games so everything is good
